message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its worth to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $20,000 price point. Would you consider lowering the price to $14,000? I believe this would still allow you to gain a reasonable profit while making the product accessible to me.
Bob, I understand your position.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This offer reflects the product's true value.

Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget, I am proposing a price of $16,000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between the value you place on the product and my financial constraints.
